metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3233 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Open redirect vulnerability in the Overlay module in Drupal 7.x before 7.38allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites andconduct phishing attacks via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3233` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.38-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.38-1').
